Wanna make your voice heard? If you're age 15 or younger, bring your audition form (and your pipes) to one of The Next Star's regional casting calls! But the first step on the road to stardom is to read the Rules and Regulations, along with the 15 things you should know about auditioning. The second step? Practice signing autographs, of course!

2. montrealApril 29th, 2014
3. winnipegMay 3st, 2014
4. edmontonMay 6th, 2014
5. vancouverMay 10th, 2014
6. torontoMay 18th-19th, 2014
